compatibility.notes: Plexus license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without restrictions. However, care should be taken when integrating with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include copyright notice and license in all redistributions.
Obtain permission for any use of the trademark 'classworlds'.
Provide a disclaimer of warranties and liabilities.
license.name: Plexus
obligations: Retain copyright statements and notices in redistributions of source code.
Include a copy of the license in redistributions of binary form.
Do not use the name 'classworlds' to endorse or promote derived products without permission.
Do not name derived products 'classworlds' without permission.
Give due credit to The Codehaus.
